metadata.title: CVE-2025-24367 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is an open source performance and fault management framework. Anauthenticated Cacti user can abuse graph creation and graph templatefunctionality to create arbitrary PHP scripts in the web root of theapplication, leading to remote code execution on the server. Thisvulnerability is fixed in 1.2.29.

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
